law.catch_line: A rebuttable presumption exists that any sale in the State is subject to the sales and use tax impos...

text.section: A rebuttable presumption exists that any sale in the State is subject to the sales and use tax imposed under § 11-102(a)(1) of this subtitle.
The person required to pay the sales and use tax has the burden of proving that a sale in the State is not subject to the sales and use tax.
